title: Scp 8727 2
content:
[[module CSS]]
.notice {
    border: solid 1px #999;
    background: #f2f2c2;
    padding: 1em;
    margin-bottom: 0.5em;
}

/* Hide the original page title */
#page-title {
  display: none;
}

/* Make my fake page title look like the original (thanks SCP-2998) */
.page-title {
  border-bottom: solid 1px #bbbbbb;
  color: #990011;
  font-weight: normal;
  margin: 0 0 0.6em;
  padding: 0 0 0.25em;
  font-size: 200%;
}
.page-title p {
  margin: 0;
}
[[/module]]

[[div_ class="notice"]]
**Welcome, O5-5.**
@@ @@
You are currently editing the file SCP-8727. Your session will time out after **900** seconds of inactivity.
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div class="page-title" style="display: block;" id="#page-title"]]
SCP-8727
[[/div]]

[[include component:image-block
name=https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-8727/church.jpg|
caption=SCP-8727.
]]

**Item #:** SCP-8727

**Object Class:** Safe

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-8727 is contained within a 1.5 km radius exclusion zone. A 3-meter-high electric fence has been installed around the perimeter. Personnel are not permitted access to the building itself, nor the cemetery behind it.

**Description:** SCP-8727 is the church and attached cemetery of "Our Lady of First Communion", located 8 km north of Puerto Natales, Chile. It was purchased as a Foundation asset in 1990 via unknown means. SCP-8727's primary anomalous property is the Foundation's inability to rid itself of it.
